effect.description: If set, this status effect will be applied by this action.
effect.markdownDescription: If set, this status effect will be applied by this action.

effects.description: If set, these status effects will be applied by this action.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md)

Adds one or more status effects to the living entity. Does not have an effect on non-living entities.

Type ID: `origins:apply_effect`
